name: Charitycoin
body:
## Bring Donations to the digital age.
Donating to nonprofits can be easier and more efficient.

Many charities accept credit card donations, but end up paying a fee to credit card processors like Visa and Mastercard. Companies that facilitate donations, like Network For Good, or Just Give, often charge their own fees as well. Credit Card transfers.

Cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin enable fast and efficient transfers of money. Some nonprofits publish their bitcoin wallet addresses, but that information is scattered around the internet. I want to build a free, open, crowd-sourced directory linking charities to their Bitcoin addresses.
